My Portfolio

Look What I Can Do for You!

Analysis

Are you looking for somebody capable of analyzing various races? No problem, as I'm experienced in dissecting the US races, British races, Irish ones, and many more.

Reviews

AAfter the race, you need somebody to take your readers through the results, don't you? I can do that; moreover, I will gauge the horse's potential and think of what the runner might be up to next time!

Stories

Horse racing brings lots of poignant or overall exciting stories. I am great at finding them, researching everything about them, and building a captivating article to excite your readers!

Copywriting

I am a skilled copywriter eager to help you out! My works have been in Czech, but my English is rather excellent, so don't hesitate and let's get your project some attention!

Worldbuilding

Concocting a brilliant story? Check. Coming up with lively dialogues? Check. Delivering some rich lore? Check. I can do all that and provide you with a brand new language if it's your thing!

HTML/CSS/SCSS Coder

Everything you see on this website is my work. I've learned HTML/CSS/SCSS/Bootstrap solely on my own; thus, if you're interested in a dedicated coder who enjoys her work, you've found the right person!
